title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Fixed syntax error in Azure Pipelines migration guide (`fanin:` → `fanin`).
Updated secret scanning docs: clarified table purpose and added Base64 detection support.
Reduced replication downtime by removing maintenance mode requirement for newer versions.
Added comprehensive README for `src/journeys` detailing journey tracks architecture.
Expanded `src/landings` README with landing page types and dependencies.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
